title: Well-written outsider article
content:
[The Smart Set, on Helvetica.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008041049/http:/thesmartset.com/article/article11050701.aspx)

I think it’s clear that the next type battle should explore the street signage of Röcksterdam.

author: cerulean
